mapper.select: SELECT VISITOR.VISITOR_ID, VISITOR.USER_LOGIN_ID, PARTY_PARENT_ROLE.PARENT_ROLE_CODE, PERSON.FIRST_NAME, PERSON.LAST_NAME, min(VISIT.FROM_DATE) AS MIN_FROM_DATE , max(THRU_DATE) AS MAX_THRU_DATE FROM VISITOR VISITOR INNER JOIN VISIT VISIT ON VISIT.VISITOR_ID = VISITOR.VISITOR_ID INNER JOIN USER_LOGIN USER_LOGIN ON USER_LOGIN.USER_LOGIN_ID = VISITOR.USER_LOGIN_ID INNER JOIN PARTY PARTY ON PARTY.PARTY_ID = VISITOR.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN PERSON PERSON ON PERSON.PARTY_ID = PARTY.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN PARTY_PARENT_ROLE PARTY_PARENT_ROLE ON PARTY_PARENT_ROLE.PARTY_ID = PARTY.PARTY_ID AND PARTY_PARENT_ROLE.ROLE_TYPE_ID = 'EMPLOYEE' group by VISITOR.VISITOR_ID
